titles.title: Let Us Go into His Dwelling Place

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 c2 c1 v3

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Once for all You became an offering By Your will we are sanctified All glory and praise to the Lamb Who died Who lives Who reigns on high{/lang-eng}

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We have come to the heavenly Jerusalem We have come to the city of God To the church enrolled in heaven To Jesus and His sprinkled blood{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let us go into His dwelling place Let us worship at His feet For Jesus has passed through the heavens Let us come to the throne of grace{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let us go into the holy place By a new and living way Jesus is our righteousness He has washed our sins away{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All glory and praise to the Lamb Who died Who lives Who reigns on high{/lang-eng}
